Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. N 060104 ZMM, pursuant to Sections197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section 8c, changing an M1-6 District to a C4-7 District and changing an M1-6 District to a C6-2 District.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060105 ZSM, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit pursuant to Section 74-743 of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 6, to allow Large Scale Development for properties. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
